Observed at: Rocky Mountain House 10:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: NW 10 km/h

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
